content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(-18.5, 17.5)
Consists of steam engine (position not specified), boiler (position -18.5, 17.5), and offshore pump (position not specified).

### Lab at position(-17.5, 23.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Lab (position -17.5, 23.5)

### Assembling machine at position(-21.5, 25.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling machine (position -21.5, 25.5)

### Copper plate mine at position(x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position x1) and a furnace at position(y1)
- Burner mining drill (position x2) and a furnace at position(y2)
- Burner mining drill (position x3) and a furnace at position(y3)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when removing entities
- Ensure the second argument for the remove function is a valid Position object. Review the coordinates being passed to the function.

### Errors when adding fuel to boiler
- Make sure there is a nearby entity that can accept coal before attempting to add fuel to the boiler.

### Errors when retrieving entities
- Verify that the entity exists at the specified position before attempting to retrieve it. Check the coordinates and ensure the entity type matches.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting to place it. Check for existing entities in the target position.
